job.title: extraction des OTC pour les mandats Prevoyance
job.script:
rem la date est mise au format YYYYMMDD pour faire un répertoire set PREFIXE_DESTINATION=%SCHEDULER_PARAM_DATEINVENTAIRE:~6,4%-%SCHEDULER_PARAM_DATEINVENTAIRE:~3,2%-%SCHEDULER_PARAM_DATEINVENTAIRE:~0,2%
IF "%SCHEDULER_PARAM_DATEINVENTAIRE%" == "JJ/MM/AAAA" GOTO CONFIG_DATE_AUTO
mkdir "%OUTPUT_PATH%" %FGA_AUTOMATE_PATH% -nogui -sql=%SQL% -ini=%INI% -datastore=OMEGA -oxlsx="%OUTPUT_PATH%\%PREFIXE_DESTINATION%_%XLS_FILE%" -@date='%SCHEDULER_PARAM_DATEINVENTAIRE%' -#date=%SCHEDULER_PARAM_DATEINVENTAIRE% %OPEN_XML_PARAM% GOTO FIN
:CONFIG_DATE_AUTO
set /a month1=%DATE:~3,1% if %month1% equ 0 ( set /a prevmonth=%DATE:~4,1%-1 ) else ( set /a prevmonth=%DATE:~3,2%-1 )
set yearprevmo=%DATE:~6,4% if %prevmonth% equ 0 set /a yearprevmo=%yearprevmo%-1 & set prevmonth=12 if %prevmonth% lss 10 set /a PREFIXE_DESTINATION=%yearprevmo%0%prevmonth% if %prevmonth% geq 10 set /a PREFIXE_DESTINATION=%yearprevmo%%prevmonth%
%FGA_AUTOMATE_PATH% -nogui -sql=%SQL% -ini=%INI% -datastore=OMEGA -oxlsx="%OUTPUT_PATH%\%PREFIXE_DESTINATION%_%XLS_FILE%" %OPEN_XML_PARAM%
:FIN
